title: Response to Saudi Attack Poses Test for Trump’s Mideast Strategy
text:
BEIRUT—The drone and cruise-missile strike that hit the heart of the Saudi oil industry this month laid bare the competing aims of the Trump administration’s policies in the Middle East. And what Washington does next will shape the views and actions of America’s allies—and rivals—around the globe.

On the one hand, the president says he wants to reduce America’s role in the turbulent region and has made clear he has little appetite for getting involved in military conflict there. On the other, he wants to contain Iranian power...
description: The cruise-missile strike that hit the heart of the Saudi oil industry this month laid bare the competing aims of the Trump administration’s policies in the Middle East. And what Washington does next will shape the views and actions of America’s allies—and rivals—around the globe.
